The long awaited Pacifix post! (well, long awaited by Jer anyway) 
=P

--- Pacifix / Crossroads ---

Pacifix scans the crowd of Autobots who accompanied him to 
where ever they are now. Simply getting off planet had been a 
struggle. All of the bots have known the treachary of the 
Tripredacus council, and knowing that a Decepticon vessel had 
followed them made them uneasy. Pacifix prepares to speak. He 
bangs his gauntlets together. "Fellow Autobots," He pauses for a 
moment, "Welcome to whatever planet we are on. As you probably 
already know, we are here to prevent the Predacons, from gaining 
an advantageous situation here, or anywhere we may find them." 
Again, he pauses for effect. "For the next while, you will probably 
participate in some of the hardest trials and tribulations while 
fighting the Decepticons. Prepare youselves." He pauses again to 
let his words sink in.

Crossroads listens intently to his leader, and fellow Autobot. He 
nods at Pacifix's points, knowing that they are important.
